mapper.insert:
SELECT board_seq.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO board ( boardno, title, writtendate, contents, views, userno, postno ) VALUES ( #{boardno }, #{title }, #{writtendate } , #{contents }, 0, #{userno }, 3 )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET views = views + 1 WHERE boardno = #{boardno }
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.*FROM ( SELECT fb.postno, fb.boardno, fb.title, fb.writtendate, fb.contents, fb.views, ut.usernick FROM board fb, user_table ut WHERE fb.userno = ut.userno AND fb.postno = 3 ORDER BY fb.views DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum ) BOARD WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5
